EmailTemplate.name: FP SG Send ONB Email
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Account} - Your foodpanda menu preview link
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Partner, Welcome to foodpanda! We are excited to have you on board with us! Your menu has now been completed by our content team. You can view your menu via your Restaurant Portal account here. Your Restaurant Portal login credentials are provided in a separate email titled "Welcome to Restaurant Portal" that has already been sent to you. If you have not received the email, please submit a request ticket over here by selecting the "Device, Software, Restaurant Portal Access" option.
Please click on the link below to approve your menu and for next steps to be on-boarded on foodpanda:
https://FoodpandaSG.formstack.com/forms/menu_dh_sg_qa?OID={!Case.OpportunityId__c}&OStg=&OName=&OWID=&Cdate=
Note: For Non-Restaurant Vendors, you are unable to make any menu changes via the Restaurant Portal! Please raise your enquiry / request / menu changes via the support link: https://foodpandasg.formstack.com/forms/foodpanda_support We are happy to help you! Sincerely,
Your foodpanda Partner Care Team
